name: Save Survey PDF to a Field
description: This module generates a PDF of a survey upon completion and saves it to a REDCap file upload field. It is configured at the project level with source instrument/target field pairs. In the event of save errors, the PDF is sent to a backup email address.

system-settings.name: 'From Address' for all emails sent by this module should a save event fail
Email address that will be CC'd in every email sent by this module should a save event fail

project-settings.name: Email address that should receive generated PDFs should this module be unable to save the PDF

sub_settings.name: Name of survey instrument that should be saved to the upload field
Field where PDFs of the survey named above should be saved
